title: Probability
body:
Javier volunteers in community events each month.
He does not do more than five events in a month. He attends exactly five events 35% of the time, four events 25%
of the time, three events 20% of the time, two events 10% of the time, one event 5% of the time, and no events 5%
of the time.
lesson: 4.1 Probability Distribution Function (PDF) for a Discrete Random Variable
